instructions.reason_for_call: From a recent order, you want to return the hose, backpack, and exchange the hiking boots to the exact same item but a waterproof variant. Make sure you mention the two requests at the same time, and if the agent says they can only do one, you prefer to do the exchange.
instructions.known_info: You are Isabella Johansson, and you live in zipcode 32286.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a bit anxious and want to get things done quickly.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I recently placed an order and I want to return a few items—the hose and the backpack. Also, I want to exchange the hiking boots I ordered for the exact same model but in a waterproof variant. Can you help me with both the return and the exchange?

message.content: Hi, I recently placed an order and I want to return a few items—the hose and the backpack. Also, I want to exchange the hiking boots I ordered for the exact same model but in a waterproof variant. Can you help me with both the return and the exchange?

messages.content:
{
  "type": "message",
  "text": "I can help with that. First I need to authenticate you by finding your user id. Please provide either your account email OR your full name (first and last) plus your ZIP code. Also please provide the order ID (e.g. '#W0000000') for the order that includes the hose, backpack, and hiking boots. 

A few important notes before we proceed:
- Returns and exchanges can only be done on orders with status 'delivered'. I will check the order status after I locate your user/account.
- For the return, I’ll need confirmation of the order ID and the list of item(s) to return (you said: hose and backpack) and the payment method to receive the refund (original payment method or an existing gift card).
- For the exchange, I’ll need confirmation of the order ID and the item(s) to exchange (you said: hiking boots). You must confirm you are exchanging to the same product type but a different variant (waterproof variant of the same model). I’ll also need the payment method to pay/receive any price difference (original payment method, an existing gift card, or another payment method on file).
- Exchanges and returns for a delivered order will change the order status to 'exchange requested' and 'return requested' respectively and you will receive a follow-up email with return instructions. Each delivered order can be returned or exchanged only once via the agent. Please confirm you have provided all items you want to exchange and return.

Please reply with:
1) Your email OR your full name + ZIP code
2) The order ID
3) Confirm the items to RETURN (hose, backpack) and the items to EXCHANGE (hiking boots -> waterproof variant)
4) Which payment method should be used for refunds/price differences (original payment method on the order, or a gift card on your account — if gift card, confirm you have sufficient balance)

Once you provide that I will look up your account and the order details and then explain the exact steps and ask for your final confirmation before making any changes."
}
